title: Pacific Island life: food from the sea
creator_credit: Hermann Schlenker and International Film Foundation
brief_description: Examines aspects of life in the Pacific Islands. Shows the lagoon being searched for clams, sea-worms, crabs and turtles. A coconut crab is caught and cooked in an open fire and the shell is used as a container, tool or toy. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
